description.value:
The Gap shaped you in some way, whether through enduring study or personal experience. Perhaps you were born during the Gap or lived through it thanks to an incredible lifespan, stasis technology, or time travel.

Tradition occult

Paradox Skill Society

Paradox Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.yXD9uU8w8uFD2OBQ]{Delete}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.mnoTqz0gjRmuc4oR]{Instant Virus}; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.kR5A0h2a9hY41wav]{Entropy Strike}; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{Confusion}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BilnTGuXrof9Dt9D]{Synaptic Pulse}; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion}; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind}; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wfleiawxsfhpRRwf]{Disappearance}; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MJx7DmjsWYzDZ3a4]{Phantasmagoria}

Warp Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.tZQpEnaFqwmU4AMZ]{Warp Presence}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.TAbOBvFU8dLzKiWw]{Forget}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.spells.Item.YAa1StmuYC2QQ043]{Reality Wipe}

Quantum Field Supernatural static obscures you from sight. You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to creatures within your quantum field. When a creature within your quantum field hits you with an attack, you lose this benefit against that creature until the start of your next turn.
